template.name: Robot
template.parameter: bool turned_random, bool turned_180, bool connected, int x, int y, int x_dir, int y_dir, int radius

transition.label: (turned_random && connected) || (turned_180 && !connected)
x += x_dir, y += y_dir, connected = connected(x, y, radius)
direction : int[0, 3]
x_dir = x_direction(direction), y_dir = y_direction(direction), turned_random = true
turned_random = false, turned_180 = false, connected = true, x = 0, y = 0, x_dir = 0, y_dir = 0
